basics.name: Christian Dela Cruz
basics.label: Computer Science and Economics Student
basics.summary: I'm pursuing a dual degree at the University of Hawaii, graduating in Spring 2025 with a B.S. in Computer Science (Data Science focus) from the Department of Information and Computer Sciences, and a B.A. in Economics (Quantitative Economics focus) from the Department of Economics.

highlights: Guide students in basic and pre-calculus mathematics
Support students and aid in their success

awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen following the completion of their high school diploma with a high school GPA of 3.6+ that is intended to support the student's enrollement for their 4-year college career.
